keyMappings:
# I only use the following keymaps, so I've unmapped the rest of them.
# Keymaps I use:
# h, j, k, l, gg, G, d, u --- movement
# i --- enter insert mode (very crucial for moving to the search bar in google, i.e., the keystroke `i/`);
# f, F --- open link in page
# o, O --- open url, bookmark, or history entry
# yy, yf --- copy link to clipboard
# /, n, N --- enter and navigate through find mode
# H, L --- navigate through history
# T --- search through tabs
# m, `, `` --- create and navigate through marks
# ]], [[ --- follow links marks previous or next
# gi --- go to the n-th input box
# gu, gU --- go up in the URL hierarchy
# ge, gE --- edit the current url and open
# y --- yank

unmapAll

map h scrollLeft
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map l scrollRight
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map d scrollPageDown
map u scrollPageUp

map i enterInsertMode

map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map o Vomnibar.activate
map O Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

map yy copyCurrentUrl
map yf LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

map H goBack
map L goForward

map T Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

map m Marks.activateCreateMode
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode

map [[ goPrevious
map ]] goNext

map gi focusInput
map gu goUp
map gU goToRoot
map ge Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map gE Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
